key.name: osd-mode
key.summary: Data items overlaid on the map
key.description: 0 = none, 1 = current WP/Max WP, 2 = next WP distance and course. This is a mask, so 3 means both OSD items.

key.name: wp-dist-size
key.summary: Font size (points) for OSD WP distance display
key.description: Font size (points) for OSD WP distance display

key.name: adjust-tz

key.name: blackbox-decode
key.description: Name of the blackbox_decode application (in case there are separate for iNav and betaflight)

key.name: geouser
key.description: A user account to query geonames.org for blackbox log timezone info. A default account of 'mwptools' is provided; however users are requested to create their own account.

key.name: zone-detect
key.summary: Application to return timezone from location
key.description: If supplied, the application will be used to return the timezone (in preference to geonames.org). The application should take latitude and longitude as parameters. See samples/tzget.sh

key.name: mag-sanity
key.description: mwp offers a primitive mag sanity checker that compares compass heading with GPS course over the ground using LTM (only). There are various hard-coded constraints (speed > 3m/s, certain flight modes) and two configurable parameters that should be set here in order to enable this check. The parameters are angular difference (⁰) and duration (s). The author finds a settings of 45,3 (i.e. 45⁰ over 3 seconds) works OK, detecting real instances (a momentarily breaking cable) and not reporting false positives.

key.name: mission-meta-tag

key.name: autoload-safehomes
key.description: . If true, then safehomes will be loaded from the FC on connection.

key.name: max-climb-angle
key.summary: Maximum climb angle highlight for terrain analysis
key.description: If non-zero, any climb angles exceeding the specified value will be highlighted in Terrain Analysis Climb / Dive report. Note that the absolute value is taken as a positive (climb) angle

key.name: max-dive-angle
key.summary: Maximum dive angle highlight for terrain analysis
key.description: If non-zero, any dive angles exceeding the specified value will be highlighted in Terrain Analysis Climb / Dive report. Note that the absolute value is taken as a negative (dive) angle

key.name: max-wps
key.description: Maximum number of WP supported

key.name: radar-list-max-altitude
key.summary: Maximum altitude for targets to show in the radar list view
key.description: Maximum altitude (metres) to include targets in the radar list view. Targets higher than this value will show only in the map view. This is mainly for ADS-B receivers where there is no need for high altitude targets to be shown. Setting to 0 disables. Note that ADS-B altitudes are AMSL (or geoid).

key.name: radar-alert-altitude
key.summary: Altitude below which ADS-B alerts may be generated
key.description: Target altitude (metres) below which ADS-B proximity alerts may be generated. Requires that 'radar-alert-range' is also set (non-zero). Setting to 0 disables. Note that ADS-B altitudes are AMSL (or geoid).

key.name: radar-alert-range
key.summary: Range below which ADS-B alerts may be generated
key.description: Target range (metres) below which ADS-B proximity alerts may be generated. Requires that 'radar-alert-altitude' is also set (non-zero). Setting to 0 disables.

key.name: gpsd-host
key.description: Provider for GCS location via gpsd. Default is "localhost", can be set to other host name or IP address. Setting blank ("") disables.

key.name: ident-limit
key.description: Timeout value in seconds for a MSP FC to reply to a MSP_INDENT probe. Effectively a timeout counter in seconds. Set to a negative value to disable.

key.name: misc-icon-size
key.description: Size for miscellaneous icons (radar, GCS location) in pixels. -1 means the image's natural size (no scaling).

key.name: show-sticks
